titleStmt.title: Receipt for list of priests and for temple inventory

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: A list of priests and an inventory ... of Bacchias ... has been presented to ... of the meris of Herakleides of the Arsinoite nome ... Antoninus ..., Mesore the first. (Second hand): Through Sarapammon ...

listBibl.bibl: P. Bacch. 17 SB VI 9334 P. Lund. III 3 BL III 104; Wilcken, U., Archiv für Papyrusforschung 13 (1939) p. 233; Hombert, M., Chronique d'Égypt 14, 1939, p. 400-401; Schmidt, K. F. W., Philologische Wochenschrift (Jahrgang) 60 (No 45/48), 1940, c. 608-611; van Groningen, B. A., Museum, Maandblad voor Philologie en Geschiedenis, 47, 1940, c. 168; TM 14152 (relates to P.Lund. inv. 103, not to P.Lund. inv. 33)
